businessProfile.name: Rock & Crust Pizza
businessProfile.address: 541 S 500 E St Ste. A, American Fork, UT 84003, USA
businessProfile.formatted_address: 541 S 500 E St Ste. A, American Fork, UT 84003, USA

reviews.text: Amazing pizza. Very fresh ingredients. They also do two specialty pizzas each month. My wife loved the gluten free pizza. Everything is so flavorful due to the freshness of the ingredients. The owner is super friendly and wants to ensure you are having a great experience. The only negative is not having root beer on tap at a pizza place. 10/10 highly recommended.

Only regret? We didn‚Äôt come for lunch tooüòÑ

Haha but for real: this pizza is the best we‚Äôve had here in Utah, hands down. We brought a huge group in as part of a family reunion and we were all completely floored by the cost to value, quality of ingredients, complex flavors, and the insane crust. This is a hidden gem - don‚Äôt miss it!

The owner is super friendly and went above and beyond to make sure our experience was exceptional. 10/10 would recommend the Brazilian Pink Lemonade - perfectly tart, feels like a party. But hey if you want basic soda there‚Äôs all the essentials too.

Personal favorites? The Rocket King is explosive, dynamic, and completely delicious (that lemony arugula on top is *chef‚Äôs kiss*). But I couldn‚Äôt stop eating the Thai; it‚Äôs got this incredible peanut sauce instead of marinara and - hear me out - the toppings are exactly the right size, so for being such a complex slice it held together really well & and each bite was well-balanced. And there‚Äôs free Mike‚Äôs Hot Honey - no extra charge; go to town.

Next time I‚Äôm going to have to try the Infernal Ricotta - it‚Äôs the owner‚Äôs favorite but our group devoured it way too fast to share.

Nice location, clean & fast service, and a perfect slice of pizza; couldn‚Äôt be happier with our visit.

So, so PERFECT!! Hot, and cheesy, and so so delicious!! Crust has the chewy, crunchy goodness! I couldn‚Äôt quit eating another piece! We ordered at least 9 or 10 different kinds‚Äî chicken bacon ranch, Thai, super meat on ranch, Hawaiian, supreme, rocket King, Buffalo wings chicken Cordon Bleu, pepperoni and every single piece was DELICIOUS!! If you haven‚Äôt ever tried it, come ASAP! You don‚Äôt want to miss this! Once you‚Äôve eaten it, you will be addicted!! Such kind, amazing service from the owner! Come and try it and tell your friends about it! You won‚Äôt regret it!!
PS‚ÄîSuper meat on ranch is the BEST!!

Food is amazing! As soon as we entered, we were greeted warmly. I mentioned to the person at the front that it was our first time there, and he immediately began guiding us through the menu and providing recommendations. After trying the pizza, I can honestly say it‚Äôs one of the best I have ever had. The crust was delicious, and the ingredients were high quality. Overall, it was a great experience, from the customer service to the food quality. I will definitely add this place to my rotation. (Half Buffalo/Inferno)

I‚Äôm honestly pretty picky about pizza, and Rock & Crust is very good! The crust is chewy, but has a little crunch to the bottom when you take a bite. We ordered a pepperoni pizza which was classic and great. The service was excellent. The only ‚Äúcon‚Äù would be the prices are a little more than I‚Äôd like to regularly spend on pizza. But I would recommend checking it out!

recentReviews.text: The pizza was amazing and the owner is just the nicest guy. You can tell they care about the work they do.  Will definitely be back again.
Best Pizza in Town. Love the variety of flavors, the ambience, and especially the people ‚ù§Ô∏è
Loved it. Sad I don‚Äôt live here to come back. Thanks for the awesome Gluten Free experience!!!

Came here because my office wouldn't stop talking about how good the pizza is. They were right! Delicious crust & quality ingredients. In addition, Raul is truly a gem who makes pizza for the love of the game. Because of that, I will be returning to Rock & Crust for my pizza needs.

Raul has to be the best pizza owner on the face of this planet. Not only does his pizzas taste amazing, he also has the vibes right. Always playing something that just triggers nostalgia. Talking about nostalgia, how about when you take that first bite of the pizza and it makes you feel like you‚Äôre a kid all over again. It makes you feel like you‚Äôre at home having a sleepover with all your friends, your parents bring home a pizza and everyone runs to the table to grab their slice. That‚Äôs the type of joy I get when eating rock and crust  pizza. Rock and Crust  is honestly my favorite pizza place of all times. Please come check it out. You won‚Äôt regret it !

I‚Äôm honestly pretty picky about pizza, and Rock & Crust is very good! The crust is chewy, but has a little crunch to the bottom when you take a bite. We ordered a pepperoni pizza which was classic and great. The service was excellent. The only ‚Äúcon‚Äù would be the prices are a little more than I‚Äôd like to regularly spend on pizza. But I would recommend checking it out!

I just have to say this place was absolutely amazing. The food was absolutely delicious. While ordering my friend said she was buying my dinner because it had been my birthday, and the person taking my order goes it's your birthday and I said it was on Monday and he wished me happy birthday and was very sweet about it. We ordered our food and sat down when our food was ready he brought it out to us and told us to enjoy. We started eating absolutely delicious some of the best pizza I've ever eaten. The next thing I knew he left and came back and brought me a little cake that said happy birthday It was some sort of little strawberry shortcake dessert that he actually left his restaurant to go buy and bring back for me. Super incredible because he didn't have to do that and it totally made my whole entire day. So this place is definitely a 10 out of 10! absolutely amazing.

We went tonight to celebrate my husband's 50th birthday. Probably some of the best pizza we've had in a LONG time but the service was even better. When they found out it was my husband's birthday, they slipped out and bought him a birthday treat. Definitely went above and beyond for us tonight. We will for sure be back!

detailedReviews.author: Andrew
detailedReviews.text: The pizza was amazing and the owner is just the nicest guy. You can tell they care about the work they do.  Will definitely be back again.

detailedReviews.author: Pamela Dunn
detailedReviews.text: Best Pizza in Town. Love the variety of flavors, the ambience, and especially the people ‚ù§Ô∏è

detailedReviews.author: Brandy Hillman
detailedReviews.text: Loved it. Sad I don‚Äôt live here to come back. Thanks for the awesome Gluten Free experience!!!

detailedReviews.author: Carson Chubbuck
detailedReviews.text: Came here because my office wouldn't stop talking about how good the pizza is. They were right! Delicious crust & quality ingredients. In addition, Raul is truly a gem who makes pizza for the love of the game. Because of that, I will be returning to Rock & Crust for my pizza needs.

That‚Äôs the type of joy I get when eating rock and crust  pizza. Rock and Crust  is honestly my favorite pizza place of all times. Please come check it out. You won‚Äôt regret it !

detailedReviews.author: Caitlin Nielson
detailedReviews.text: I‚Äôm honestly pretty picky about pizza, and Rock & Crust is very good! The crust is chewy, but has a little crunch to the bottom when you take a bite. We ordered a pepperoni pizza which was classic and great. The service was excellent. The only ‚Äúcon‚Äù would be the prices are a little more than I‚Äôd like to regularly spend on pizza. But I would recommend checking it out!

detailedReviews.author: Kelli (Blondiegirl81877)
detailedReviews.text: I just have to say this place was absolutely amazing. The food was absolutely delicious. While ordering my friend said she was buying my dinner because it had been my birthday, and the person taking my order goes it's your birthday and I said it was on Monday and he wished me happy birthday and was very sweet about it. We ordered our food and sat down when our food was ready he brought it out to us and told us to enjoy. We started eating absolutely delicious some of the best pizza I've ever eaten. The next thing I knew he left and came back and brought me a little cake that said happy birthday It was some sort of little strawberry shortcake dessert that he actually left his restaurant to go buy and bring back for me. Super incredible because he didn't have to do that and it totally made my whole entire day. So this place is definitely a 10 out of 10! absolutely amazing.

detailedReviews.author: Beckie Frame
detailedReviews.text: We went tonight to celebrate my husband's 50th birthday. Probably some of the best pizza we've had in a LONG time but the service was even better. When they found out it was my husband's birthday, they slipped out and bought him a birthday treat. Definitely went above and beyond for us tonight. We will for sure be back!

detailedReviews.author: Dominique Landry Giron
detailedReviews.text: What a great little find this Pizza place is!   I love Pizza, and Rock & Crust didn't disappoint.  Good serving sizes/toppings, great crust and even better service! Family run and it shows how much they care about taking care of customers. I was visiting AF from Canada and will definitely be back:)

detailedReviews.author: Sid Gibson
detailedReviews.text: Some of the best pizza I‚Äôve had in a while! Tasted super fresh and delicious. It‚Äôs got a fun feel to it with the rock music and the lights. Would totally go here again!

detailedReviews.author: Amy Oswald
detailedReviews.text: Delicious Pizza!! Awesome Gluten Free Pizza too!

detailedReviews.author: JJ Oswald
detailedReviews.text: The pizza here is so good! The Gluten Free pizza is the best I have had at a restaurant.

detailedReviews.author: Collette Curtis
detailedReviews.text: The best pizza I‚Äôve ever had! Fun atmosphere and friendly staff.

detailedReviews.author: MegaJodog
detailedReviews.text: This is the only pizza i can eat that doesnt hurt my stomach! It is really good as well and still amazing when you reheat it. And the people who work there are very friendly!

detailedReviews.author: Zia
detailedReviews.text: The pizza was very mid, not sure why the reviews are so good. Honestly dominos tastes better than Rock and Crust and is cheaper.

detailedReviews.author: Mauro Herrera
detailedReviews.text: Food is amazing! As soon as we entered, we were greeted warmly. I mentioned to the person at the front that it was our first time there, and he immediately began guiding us through the menu and providing recommendations. After trying the pizza, I can honestly say it‚Äôs one of the best I have ever had. The crust was delicious, and the ingredients were high quality. Overall, it was a great experience, from the customer service to the food quality. I will definitely add this place to my rotation. (Half Buffalo/Inferno)

detailedReviews.author: Melo
detailedReviews.text: I‚Äôm so glad I stumbled across this absolute gem of a pizza place. Raul is truly amazing‚Äîhe‚Äôs clearly passionate about what he does, and it shows in every bite. You can tell he puts his heart and soul into his pizzas. The ingredients are always fresh, and the care he puts into crafting each one makes all the difference. It‚Äôs rare to find a place that feels this genuine. If you haven‚Äôt been yet, you‚Äôre missing out on something special!

detailedReviews.author: Trevor Nelson
detailedReviews.text: Good pizza, fair pricing. Will come again!

detailedReviews.author: Eric Sorensen
detailedReviews.text: The reviews are true. This place is legit. The food is fantastic and the owners are my new best amigos. ¬°Gracias Raul y H√©ctor por tocar la m√∫sica de mi hijo en su restaurante mientras mi esposa y yo cen√°bamos!

detailedReviews.author: Paris
detailedReviews.text: This is a wonderful place to eat pizza and some of the best Hawaiian we‚Äôve ever eaten in our lifetime! You can tell the owners put their heart into the place. It‚Äôs beautiful and beyond clean‚Äîlike spotless. We ordered extra pizza planning on having left overs‚Äîthe sizes were very large and we still didn‚Äôt have any left because we were surprised how yummy it was. Thanks to Rock and Crust for providing a fun and memorable meal for our fam.

detailedReviews.author: Nate Todd
detailedReviews.text: I think the owner has his recipes dialed down to a science. He's developed the best pizza in Utah.

detailedReviews.author: Rileybacon Baker
detailedReviews.text: Not going to lie I put this place to a torture test first thing in the morning. Ordered a bunch of pizzas for our local mechanic shop with a bunch of hungry techs. Came to pick them up at the expected time and they where almost finished and the gentleman came to tell me one of the pizzas stuck and failed. Instead of sending me with a sub par pizza he went into overdrive and made me another and i was only very slightly late.(super impressive) Always have problems with other places having things done on time and they did great to try and get our crazy order done. Pizza was great! Great service! Great little spot. Great people! We will be back!  Thanks for feeding a bunch of picky, hungry techs that all said they would be happy to eat there again! Thanks!

detailedReviews.author: Scott Nelson
detailedReviews.text: Besides a hankering to play q-bert after I walked through the doors,  the place is clean and not noisy,  staff helpful. We ordered in the last minutes of the day,  but they got it done before closing.  The app for ordering made it easy. Minus a few places on the crust of the pizza, it was a well-done pie. The cheese sticks had a larger crust which my wife wife likes better than thin.  But for my taste, the pizza toppings are what I go for,  not the crust.

detailedReviews.author: Megann Tulley
detailedReviews.text: All was great.   Food was so soooo good! Service was amazing! Owner was awesome and gave us free ice cream

detailedReviews.author: Tanner Johnson
detailedReviews.text: Delicious pizza. Awesome owner. Highly recommend!

detailedReviews.author: Ashlyn Johnson
detailedReviews.text: We ordered a BBQ, Margherita, Meat & Heat, and a Pepperoni! All 10/10!!! New fav local pizza joint

detailedReviews.author: Jeff Hilton
detailedReviews.text:
I ordered a pizza for delivery, 1/2 sausage, 1/2 BBQ pizza with chicken and mushrooms. $45. I used the preferred online ordering method.

1/2 BBQ Chicken, 1/2 Sausage. That's what was on the menu I ordered from. It's what was on the receipt. It's all I ever saw when ordering online.

But apparently, I got pineapple on it because that's the "default BBQ." Pineapple. Seriously?

To make it clear, even that's true, that's not obvious in the "preferred online delivery method" set up for ordering online unless you deliberately scroll past the option to go half/half to carefully read the description of what the word "BBQ" means specifically at this restaurant.

More realistically, if you order a half/half, ordering it through their preferred provider displays pineapple as an extra, like you'd expect anywhere else.

I didn't have the option to unselect pineapple to begin with. Even if I knew ahead of time that the BBQ came with pineapple by default, I literally could not unselect that option. It wasn't selected in the first place. So why should I be expected to magically know to go back out of the actual menu item I was trying to order to go find a detailed description of the word BBQ to learn that the store owner thinks "BBQ" means Hawaiian. Even knowing this, how do I communicate through the app that I want the pineapple taken off if the option's not selected in the first place?

I tried calling several times to see if I could get the order corrected. No answer.

I literally drove back to explain what happened.

From my perspective, all I wanted was a barbecue pizza with chicken and mushrooms like I always get at other pizza places, and that the store must have gotten the order wrong.

So like a good business man, the owner chose to get into an argument with me when I insisted on keeping the mistake pizza for all the trouble.

If it's not clear:

Other times I've had this issue, that's the courtesy: the restaurant delivers a replacement for free for the inconvenience. This is true whether it's pizza or not -- if the restaurant makes a mistake, they deliver you the corrected order for free. And the reason is because the customer made a specific, expensive order and it's on the restaurant to get that right. A customer ordering for delivery and paying a premium for it should not have to drive back to your restaurant if there's an issue they need to get corrected.

But apparently, to this store owner, if a customer drives all the way back to the store because no one would answer the phone, apparently the customer is actually "taking advantage" of the store for insisting on keeping the first pizza.

To the owner directly: if someone thinks your pizza is worth enough to spend the time to drive back to talk to you (undoing the value of getting it delivered), don't spit in their face by telling them "It's none of the customer's business" that you don't answer your phone and that "the customer is taking advantage of you" by insisting on keeping a pizza you guys are just going to throw away. If you had actually bothered answering your phone, you wouldn't have even had the chance to take it back, and your only option to correct the issue would have been to replace it for free.

Why should I give it back when
- I had to go back b/c you won't answer your phone?
- you made a poor excuse for why you put The Meme Topping‚Ñ¢ on my pizza
-  the only thing you as the owner can safely do with the old one is throw it away?

Is the only person whose time and money are valuable yours?

But I guess the owner "doesn't need customers like me." These are all things the owner said to my face.

I'm not a business man, but I think the cost of a lost pizza is not worth ignoring and then directly insulting a customer who just wanted his favorite pizza order at a new place. All I expected was to be able to actually customize my pizza like I can anywhere else. Instead I got told off by some self-important jerk who thinks their customers should have to pay more to beg and grovel for the privilege of having a worse customer experience than dominoes.

detailedReviews.author: Cameron Wyrick
detailedReviews.text: 3rd time going & it has yet to disappoint. Best pizza in the county.

detailedReviews.author: abby arnold
detailedReviews.text: Great service! Love this place and their pizza.

detailedReviews.author: Carolina Castro
detailedReviews.text: The queen pizza is by far the best prizza i‚Äôve ever tried! The place is amazing and the owner is such a nice person! Would 100% recommend!

detailedReviews.author: Chad Gwilliam
detailedReviews.text:
We had such a great lunch here. When in the area and looking for a place to eat we saw the great reviews and decided to give it a try. We were not disappointed.

We got one large and I'm medium with half meat/half chicken bacon ranch/half margarita/half tomato, mushroom and sausage. And then I couldn't resist some cheese bread.

The pizza was fresh and delicious. It is a thin crust pizza and you can taste the freshness. I was with some family members and tried the hot honey they have on the side.... it was a huge hit!

Pizza was good, service was even better. Raul (the owner?) came and greeted us and brought us our üçï. They mixed up which size pizza had which toppings (which wasn't that big of a deal) so Raul made us an extra one to take with us when we left.

What was even cooler was my daughter who leaves to Mexico on her mission this week was with us and through talking with Raul we discovered that his sister lives in the area that she is going to serve. It's a big area and has at least three missions in the area. But..... through our conversation we actually found that the town she lives in is within her mission boundaries. My daughter has her name and will be keeping an eye out for her!

Anyway, great lunch experience all the way around.... great food, great service..... we will be back! Thanks Raul!

detailedReviews.author: Rachel Paulson
detailedReviews.text:
10/10 across the board! GLUTEN FREE pizza that is actually truly 100% gluten free - does not touch anything that gluten touches. And DELICIOUS, cooked to perfection - the gluten free crust was stellar in flavor and texture.
Atmosphere is incredible - clean and tidy rock n‚Äô roll. Best music playing and vibes are high! The owner is so kind and the service was spectacular.
Super clean and cool bathroom! :)
This place is a 10/10, definitely stop in for an INCREDIBLE and fun pizza experience!! üôåüèª‚ù§Ô∏è Barely got photos because we dived in so fast!!
Highly recommend the gluten free crust, pesto w/ chicken, and the chicken bacon ranch! üôåüèª

detailedReviews.author: Austin Walker (Austin11777)
detailedReviews.text: This pizza is amazing!!! The owner took great care of us, love the atmosphere as well. The restaurant is very clean and welcoming. Will be back soon!

detailedReviews.author: Stephano Liza
detailedReviews.text:
Highly recommend this pizza restaurant to any pizza enthusiast, foodie, or just looking for a good pizza spot in town!

They nailed the spot with the crust! Many pizza places make there‚Äôs too thick and messy, but this one felt just right!

detailedReviews.author: David Blakely
detailedReviews.text: Fantastic pizza! I loved the quality of the food and the service was great as well. I‚Äôll definitely be going back again and again.

detailedReviews.author: David Witt
detailedReviews.text: Amazing pizza. Very fresh ingredients. They also do two specialty pizzas each month. My wife loved the gluten free pizza. Everything is so flavorful due to the freshness of the ingredients. The owner is super friendly and wants to ensure you are having a great experience. The only negative is not having root beer on tap at a pizza place. 10/10 highly recommended.

detailedReviews.author: J Rodriguez
detailedReviews.text: This was our first time trying this pizza place out and let me tell you, the pizza here is phenomenal. Pricing and atmosphere was very pleasant. Will recommend to family and friends. We will be back ASAP!

detailedReviews.author: Trent Bates
detailedReviews.text: Best pizza in Utah county!

detailedReviews.author: Kevin King
detailedReviews.text: A little pricey, but really good. I be back

detailedReviews.author: Mark Johnson-Barbier
detailedReviews.text:
Wow.  Best pizza. Best crust.
I‚Äôm going to change our summer vacation route so we can come back next week.
Tried Bleu, Thai, buffalo and we‚Äôve never had better pizza anywhere.  Family liked it so much we got another buffalo to go.

detailedReviews.author: Amber Johnson
detailedReviews.text:
Only regret? We didn‚Äôt come for lunch tooüòÑ

Haha but for real: this pizza is the best we‚Äôve had here in Utah, hands down. We brought a huge group in as part of a family reunion and we were all completely floored by the cost to value, quality of ingredients, complex flavors, and the insane crust. This is a hidden gem - don‚Äôt miss it!

The owner is super friendly and went above and beyond to make sure our experience was exceptional. 10/10 would recommend the Brazilian Pink Lemonade - perfectly tart, feels like a party. But hey if you want basic soda there‚Äôs all the essentials too.

Personal favorites? The Rocket King is explosive, dynamic, and completely delicious (that lemony arugula on top is *chef‚Äôs kiss*). But I couldn‚Äôt stop eating the Thai; it‚Äôs got this incredible peanut sauce instead of marinara and - hear me out - the toppings are exactly the right size, so for being such a complex slice it held together really well & and each bite was well-balanced. And there‚Äôs free Mike‚Äôs Hot Honey - no extra charge; go to town.

Next time I‚Äôm going to have to try the Infernal Ricotta - it‚Äôs the owner‚Äôs favorite but our group devoured it way too fast to share.

Nice location, clean & fast service, and a perfect slice of pizza; couldn‚Äôt be happier with our visit.

detailedReviews.author: julie beutler
detailedReviews.text:
So, so PERFECT!! Hot, and cheesy, and so so delicious!! Crust has the chewy, crunchy goodness! I couldn‚Äôt quit eating another piece! We ordered at least 9 or 10 different kinds‚Äî chicken bacon ranch, Thai, super meat on ranch, Hawaiian, supreme, rocket King, Buffalo wings chicken Cordon Bleu, pepperoni and every single piece was DELICIOUS!! If you haven‚Äôt ever tried it, come ASAP! You don‚Äôt want to miss this! Once you‚Äôve eaten it, you will be addicted!! Such kind, amazing service from the owner! Come and try it and tell your friends about it! You won‚Äôt regret it!!
PS‚ÄîSuper meat on ranch is the BEST!!

detailedReviews.author: Nicola Jackson
detailedReviews.text: Rock & crust pizza is amazing and I‚Äôve been telling everyone about it since we are there this past Saturday. The owner is so friendly and helpful. The pepperoni with ricotta and hot honey was my favorite and the Brazilian pink lemonade is delicious. Just do yourself a favor and eat here!

detailedReviews.author: Sister Bowns
detailedReviews.text:
First visit & we loved it! We will definitely be back. Came for the gluten free pizza and loved everything.
We got the gf half cheese/half pepperoni, cheese sticks, and a half hawaiian/half thai.
We would order all of them again 100%

detailedReviews.author: Sheena Bates
detailedReviews.text: We love rock and crust pizza. We‚Äôve eaten here several times and it‚Äôs always delicious! Best pizza around!

detailedReviews.author: melissa edgeworth
detailedReviews.text: This place is utterly charming, and the food is top-notch. Even the bathroom is cute.

detailedReviews.author: Joshua Hunt
detailedReviews.text: Best Chicken bacon ranch pizza I‚Äôve found. The pizza wasn‚Äôt dry, nice and creamy with lots of flavor. Bacon has a great crunch. Crust is cooked how I like, nice and light with a crunch but still fluffy. Owner is very nice and personable. Good atmosphere.

detailedReviews.author: Kaitlyn Hunt
detailedReviews.text: Rock & Crust Pizza has some of the best pizza I‚Äôve had in a long time! Along with the great tasting pizza, the service and atmosphere was welcoming and made you feel at home!

detailedReviews.author: Kelly Worman
detailedReviews.text: We‚Äôre from Chicago and it‚Äôs hard to find good away from home. This place has great pizza and the owner is super friendly you can tell he really care about the ingredients he uses for his pizza.

detailedReviews.author: Dale Mecham
detailedReviews.text: Clean. Friendly. Excellent food.

detailedReviews.author: Mark Palmer
detailedReviews.text: Food was great and staff was even better.

detailedReviews.author: John Rakowski
detailedReviews.text:
Delicious pizza with very friendly staff and good music. I just got done doing a hike in provo canyon on a hot day, and was wanting a rewarding and substantial pizza.

They had a selection of special pizzas but whenever I try a new pizza place I get a classic pepperoni. I was not disappointed. The texture of the crust was perfectly squishy and soft. With good stretchy cheese and tasty pepperoni.

So I'll definitely be making a return and trying out their Thai pizza or their special infernal.

detailedReviews.author: Brandi Johnson
detailedReviews.text:
Gluten Free Pizza AND cheese bread that has crunch and tastes incredible! üôåüèº
Mostly the service was impeccable. So kind!
The owner explained they have a dedicated table for in the kitchen for gluten free preparation.

Highly recommend!

Was so good I dug in before taking photos for the review.

detailedReviews.author: Brandon Ortega
detailedReviews.text: The food is incredible, but the owner/manager is second to none. He goes above and beyond for his customers and neighboring businesses. Hard working, class act individual who cares about every person he comes in contact with. Highly recommend stopping in his place and grabbing a bite.

detailedReviews.author: Barbara H
detailedReviews.text: Finally! Good pizza! Excellent crust. Fun music. Left VERY happy! Can‚Äôt wait to come back! üòÅ

detailedReviews.author: Kaelyn Larson
detailedReviews.text: Wonderful experience. The Greek Saad was fresh and the dressing was excellent. The cheese bread was delicious! My party ordered four different kinds of pizza, all were fantastic. Perfect crust. The chicken, bacon ranch might have been our top choice, but we loved them all.

detailedReviews.author: Davis Larson
detailedReviews.text: Great thin crust, service was great as well. The owner even came out and chatted for a bit. Great little new spot for some pizza

detailedReviews.author: Clarissa Thomas
detailedReviews.text: I am celiac and had a wonderful experience getting gluten free, no cross contamination with Rock & Crust. The owner Raul was so kind and took time to check on us, tell us about their process to keep things gluten free, and get to know us. It meant so much and we will definitely come back. The food was spectacular! We even think a GF crust next time for the whole family would even work because either was that good.

detailedReviews.author: Sarah Ellis
detailedReviews.text: Rock & Crust serves up some incredible pizza. A lovely thin crust with some unique offerings. I got the Thai and spouse got the ranch. Neither disappointed. Customer service was spot on too. They have a fountain soda machine coming once Coca-Cola finishes installing. Easy to park, good seating, clean bathrooms.

detailedReviews.author: Gerolyn Ryan
detailedReviews.text: I love it here, the pizza is so good, the owner is the sweetest, and really glad we found this place. ‚ô•Ô∏è

detailedReviews.author: john gregson
detailedReviews.text: The owner is super fantastic and made sure the service was quality. The food is some of the best pizza i‚Äôve had.

detailedReviews.author: Jeremy Wright
detailedReviews.text: This was absolutely AMAZING pizza! The crust was the perfect blend of crispy and soft, the sauce was spot-on, and the cheese and toppings were delicious. Raul, the owner, is a rock star!

detailedReviews.author: sophie arnold
detailedReviews.text: got the bbq and meat lovers and it was 11/10! Highly recommend, new favorite pizza place! Also love that they have gluten free options available

detailedReviews.author: Crypto Snowboarder
detailedReviews.text: Good quality pizza

detailedReviews.author: Angela Carder
detailedReviews.text: Delicious pizza, awesome staff, and homemade ranch! And you can split larger pizzas to try 2 in 1. The Thai pizza is a must!!

detailedReviews.author: Stephanie Phipps
detailedReviews.text: Tried this local gem on a whim, and it did not disappoint! Don't miss it! The Meat and Heat Pizza, with green chilies, elevates this dish to another level. It's my new favorite, and they are quick!

detailedReviews.author: Jorge Ivan Cuello Quintero
detailedReviews.text:
The atmosphere is cozy, the service is outstanding, and it‚Äôs clear everything is made with passion and a love for good food. If you‚Äôre in the area, going to this pizzeria isn‚Äôt a recommendation‚Äîit‚Äôs a must.
Thank you for giving us the best pizza in the world. I‚Äôll be back again and again

detailedReviews.author: Rosa Cristina Quintero Estrada
detailedReviews.text:
‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è
Rock & Crust Pizza is hands down the best pizzeria I‚Äôve tried in Utah. Their pizzas are outstanding ‚Äî perfect crust, fresh ingredients, and flavors that truly stand out.

Customer service is top-notch. The staff is friendly, attentive, and always committed to providing a great experience.

The atmosphere is warm and inviting, perfect for enjoying with family or friends. Rock & Crust Pizza has definitely become my go-to spot for amazing pizza!

detailedReviews.author: Jordan Faux
detailedReviews.text: Over priced for the size and quality

detailedReviews.author: Savanna Farr
detailedReviews.text: This place is awesome! The service is fantastic and the owner seems to really care about customer service and quality food! My friend and i discovered this place last week and craved it all week until we could go back again! Definitely have some new regulars and we will be bringing all our friends!

detailedReviews.author: Jacob Madsen
detailedReviews.text:
Great pizza! They‚Äôve changed their crust to a 48-72 hour fermented dough. It has a fantastic flavor, and great texture!

Food, service and atmosphere are all a 10/10.

In my opinion, I would consider using less seasoning in the sauce - it was a bit overpowering. I‚Äôd also use less sauce in general on the pizza. Also, I‚Äôd try playing around with a different type of pepperoni.

Overall - great experience! I will be going back.

detailedReviews.author: Kristi Dickamore
detailedReviews.text: The food was delicious, but what put this place over the top was the service. They were attentive and went above and beyond to make sure our group was taken care of. We had 9 kids with us and it was closing time. They were not only were ok with us being there so late, but they gave the kids extra food and drinks to make sure we were comfortable. The pizza sauce was better than any other that I‚Äôve had as well.

detailedReviews.author: Trinity Taylor
detailedReviews.text: absolute 10/10 food and experience. i‚Äôm gluten and dairy free, and the owner here made sure that my experience was perfect. he offered me extra sauce, and even has a veggie cheese. the BEST gluten free crust i have had in a while. this is my new craving spot, so glad i decided to try the pizza!

detailedReviews.author: Thomas Sartwell
detailedReviews.text:
I absolutely love this place!

The owner is the nicest guy. Every time we come in, he is so kind to my kids and often shares treats with them.

Not to mention he makes my fav pizza in the valley. Crispy and thin, yet just enough chew to the crust.

detailedReviews.author: Bailey Beckstead
detailedReviews.text: We got a half Thai half margarita pizza and it was very fresh and delicious and came out very fast. The garlic bread was also super good.

detailedReviews.author: Vicki Hansen
detailedReviews.text: We love Rock & Crust. The pizza is delicious and unique and Raul the owner is really engaging and kind.

detailedReviews.author: zach morton
detailedReviews.text: Only giving one star because of their bad time management. I ordered my pizza online at 8:15 pm and scheduled it to be ready at 9:15 pm. I got there at 9:14 and my pizza hadn‚Äôt even been made yet. I was with four individuals who did the same thing and we all waited 30 minutes for them to make our pizza and put it in the oven. If I am going to pre order my pizza an hour in advance, I expect it to be done on time. With that, when we got there there was no other customers in the restaurant.

detailedReviews.author: Becky Johnson
detailedReviews.text: The best food. The best owner. ‚ô•Ô∏è

detailedReviews.author: Phillip Fink
detailedReviews.text:
We‚Äôve been coming here on Monday nights for the past few weeks for our family night, and it‚Äôs quickly become something we all look forward to. It‚Äôs family-owned (not a chain), and you can feel the difference right away‚Äîin both the food and the atmosphere.

The pizza is seriously incredible. The crust is next-level‚Äîperfectly balanced, not too thick or thin, and just the right amount of crisp without being too hard. We‚Äôve been trying different kinds each time, and every one has had its own unique flavor. Nothing cookie-cutter here‚Äîjust really creative, really good pizza.

On top of that, the customer service is amazing. Everyone is super friendly, and you can tell they genuinely care that you‚Äôre having a great experience. It feels personal, not just like another transaction.

If you‚Äôre looking for a place with great food and a great vibe, I can‚Äôt recommend Rock & Crust enough. Definitely worth making it your regular spot.

detailedReviews.author: Meghan Humphries
detailedReviews.text:
This is a mid pizza. That's just what it is.

Positives:
The garlic cheese bread is dang good. It's just cheese, garlic and butter on a pizza crust, but it's awesome. Really, they earn the name "Rock & Crust" because their crust really rocks. It's chewy without being too dense and it's flavorful. The ranch also seems house-made and it's great.

Negatives:
That sauce. Like sugar straight to the tongue, it's way too sweet with no other flavor to buoy it up. We got the "Hot" pizza, and besides lacking spice of any kind, it had hardly enough cheese to call it a pizza. Essentially, we got great crust with too-sweet marinara sauce and peppers on top. The pepperoni was good when you could find it, but the cheese was non-existent.

Overall, a very meh experience for what I paid. They only have one small party table in a sea of huge ones. The teenage boys working the front argued about who got what drink and which pizza when there were only 3 of us in the store, which was entertaining but a bit pitiful.
If they fixed their sauce and actually added ingredients to their pizza, I'd go back for that crust. As it stands, though... mid.

detailedReviews.author: Lmichellea
detailedReviews.text: The food is delicious!! Some of the best pizza we've had in Utah, and the employees  and owner were incredibly kind and attentive. They were also patient with our rambunctious and excited kids. Thank you for a great experience!

detailedReviews.author: Oakley Penrod
detailedReviews.text: The pizza was delicious, yummy ranch! Staff wasn‚Äôt the most friendly but I think they were just busy.

detailedReviews.author: Robert Requilman
detailedReviews.text: Just picked up a pizza on the fly from this place and man it was excellent! Not sure what ranch they use or if they make in house but that was some of the best ranch to accompany an excellent pizza! Will definitely be coming back and highly recommend!

detailedReviews.author: Ellie Lem
detailedReviews.text:
We squeezed in about 30 minutes before close. The staff were so nice and who I think was the owner was so nice! He put on Bluey for our daughter, gave her a chocolate milk, and was so thoughtful with cutting our pizza so there were little slices for her and bigger slices for us!

Just a good classic pizza tooüçï

detailedReviews.author: C Armijo
detailedReviews.text:
THANK YOU! I‚Äôve been on the hunt for a tasty gluten free pizza and this place has made my heart so happy! The chicken bacon ranch was awesome! Great quality ingredients.
The Brazilian pink drink was perfectly balanced - not too sweet and just sour enough! Yum!
Customer service was wonderful too. I‚Äôll be back soon!

detailedReviews.author: Hugo Campos
detailedReviews.text: A clean and delicious place, the people who work there are super nice , I will definitely eat pizza there again.

detailedReviews.author: Cindy Barrowes
detailedReviews.text: Amazing pizza! Very good gluten free options. Great atmosphere. Amazing service. We will be back! Kids loved it too.

detailedReviews.author: Amber Mortensen
detailedReviews.text: Food was fresh and delicious. Staff was helpful and nice. Had a nice big table for our group and tvs to watch the baseball game.

detailedReviews.author: Dylan Bay
detailedReviews.text: Tons of good options, prices are fair! Everyone liked what we ordered (stuffed breadsticks were heavenly, grape pizza was good although balsamic was slightly strong, hot honey was very solid, southern option was super unique and tasty, salad was good) and they had some nice live music that Friday night.

detailedReviews.author: Karen Spencer
detailedReviews.text:
AMAZING pizza place!! I had heard good things but it far surpassed my expectations. It's a lot like Slab in Provo, in that the toppings are creative, but the crust is way better and the toppings are fresher. My husband had celiac and he said the Gluten-free crust was great, too!

My teenager keep asking us when we're going back!

detailedReviews.author: Zach D
detailedReviews.text: Price is decent for some of the best pizza outside new york. Really, it like a portnoy 8.1 right here. Nuff said

detailedReviews.author: Steve Caloca
detailedReviews.text: Best pizza ever!

detailedReviews.author: Kelly Hatch
detailedReviews.text: Pizza is a thicker crust not thin, which I prefer.  I had a combination pizza, which tasted great.  Ownership and staff are very friendly.  I'm looking forward to seeing the inside when it's completely decorated in its music theme.

customerMoodAnalysis.sentimentSummary: Customers are genuinely thrilled with their experience. With an average 4.8/5 rating across 100 recent reviews, your restaurant consistently exceeds expectations.

strengthsPerceived: Customers love the personal touch and exceptional service, such as staff going above and beyond by celebrating birthdays with special treats. - social media marketing can showcase this strength
The pizza is praised for its delicious crust and high-quality, fresh ingredients, making it a standout choice for pizza lovers. - SEO services can leverage this for better visibility
The fun atmosphere with rock music and nostalgic vibes creates a unique dining experience that customers enjoy. - social media marketing can showcase this strength
improvementOpportunities: Negative reviews and reputation issues, particularly regarding customer service and order accuracy - review management can address this concern
Long wait times and order management issues - Boostly marketing services can improve this
Competition and discovery issues, as customers compare the restaurant unfavorably to competitors like Domino's - SEO services can solve this visibility issue

positive.author: Andrew
positive.text: The pizza was amazing and the owner is just the nicest guy. You can tell they care about the work they do.  Will definitely be back again.

positive.author: Pamela Dunn
positive.text: Best Pizza in Town. Love the variety of flavors, the ambience, and especially the people ‚ù§Ô∏è

neutral.author: Zia
neutral.text: The pizza was very mid, not sure why the reviews are so good. Honestly dominos tastes better than Rock and Crust and is cheaper.

neutral.author: Meghan Humphries
neutral.text:
This is a mid pizza. That's just what it is.

Positives:
The garlic cheese bread is dang good. It's just cheese, garlic and butter on a pizza crust, but it's awesome. Really, they earn the name "Rock & Crust" because their crust really rocks. It's chewy without being too dense and it's flavorful. The ranch also seems house-made and it's great.

Negatives:
That sauce. Like sugar straight to the tongue, it's way too sweet with no other flavor to buoy it up. We got the "Hot" pizza, and besides lacking spice of any kind, it had hardly enough cheese to call it a pizza. Essentially, we got great crust with too-sweet marinara sauce and peppers on top. The pepperoni was good when you could find it, but the cheese was non-existent.

Overall, a very meh experience for what I paid. They only have one small party table in a sea of huge ones. The teenage boys working the front argued about who got what drink and which pizza when there were only 3 of us in the store, which was entertaining but a bit pitiful.
If they fixed their sauce and actually added ingredients to their pizza, I'd go back for that crust. As it stands, though... mid.

negative.author: Jeff Hilton
negative.text:
I ordered a pizza for delivery, 1/2 sausage, 1/2 BBQ pizza with chicken and mushrooms. $45. I used the preferred online ordering method.

1/2 BBQ Chicken, 1/2 Sausage. That's what was on the menu I ordered from. It's what was on the receipt. It's all I ever saw when ordering online.

But apparently, I got pineapple on it because that's the "default BBQ." Pineapple. Seriously?

To make it clear, even that's true, that's not obvious in the "preferred online delivery method" set up for ordering online unless you deliberately scroll past the option to go half/half to carefully read the description of what the word "BBQ" means specifically at this restaurant.

More realistically, if you order a half/half, ordering it through their preferred provider displays pineapple as an extra, like you'd expect anywhere else.

I didn't have the option to unselect pineapple to begin with. Even if I knew ahead of time that the BBQ came with pineapple by default, I literally could not unselect that option. It wasn't selected in the first place. So why should I be expected to magically know to go back out of the actual menu item I was trying to order to go find a detailed description of the word BBQ to learn that the store owner thinks "BBQ" means Hawaiian. Even knowing this, how do I communicate through the app that I want the pineapple taken off if the option's not selected in the first place?

I tried calling several times to see if I could get the order corrected. No answer.

I literally drove back to explain what happened.

From my perspective, all I wanted was a barbecue pizza with chicken and mushrooms like I always get at other pizza places, and that the store must have gotten the order wrong.

So like a good business man, the owner chose to get into an argument with me when I insisted on keeping the mistake pizza for all the trouble.

If it's not clear:

Other times I've had this issue, that's the courtesy: the restaurant delivers a replacement for free for the inconvenience. This is true whether it's pizza or not -- if the restaurant makes a mistake, they deliver you the corrected order for free. And the reason is because the customer made a specific, expensive order and it's on the restaurant to get that right. A customer ordering for delivery and paying a premium for it should not have to drive back to your restaurant if there's an issue they need to get corrected.

But apparently, to this store owner, if a customer drives all the way back to the store because no one would answer the phone, apparently the customer is actually "taking advantage" of the store for insisting on keeping the first pizza.

To the owner directly: if someone thinks your pizza is worth enough to spend the time to drive back to talk to you (undoing the value of getting it delivered), don't spit in their face by telling them "It's none of the customer's business" that you don't answer your phone and that "the customer is taking advantage of you" by insisting on keeping a pizza you guys are just going to throw away. If you had actually bothered answering your phone, you wouldn't have even had the chance to take it back, and your only option to correct the issue would have been to replace it for free.

Why should I give it back when
- I had to go back b/c you won't answer your phone?
- you made a poor excuse for why you put The Meme Topping‚Ñ¢ on my pizza
-  the only thing you as the owner can safely do with the old one is throw it away?

Is the only person whose time and money are valuable yours?

But I guess the owner "doesn't need customers like me." These are all things the owner said to my face.

I'm not a business man, but I think the cost of a lost pizza is not worth ignoring and then directly insulting a customer who just wanted his favorite pizza order at a new place. All I expected was to be able to actually customize my pizza like I can anywhere else. Instead I got told off by some self-important jerk who thinks their customers should have to pay more to beg and grovel for the privilege of having a worse customer experience than dominoes.

negative.author: Jordan Faux
negative.text: Over priced for the size and quality

negative.author: zach morton
negative.text: Only giving one star because of their bad time management. I ordered my pizza online at 8:15 pm and scheduled it to be ready at 9:15 pm. I got there at 9:14 and my pizza hadn‚Äôt even been made yet. I was with four individuals who did the same thing and we all waited 30 minutes for them to make our pizza and put it in the oven. If I am going to pre order my pizza an hour in advance, I expect it to be done on time. With that, when we got there there was no other customers in the restaurant.

recommendations.title: Generate More Reviews
recommendations.description: Encourage satisfied customers to leave reviews
